detectors.description:
SocialFunToken.transfer(address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/SocialFunToken.sol#70-81) may have integer overflow
	Possible nodes:
	- balances[msg.sender] >= _amount && _amount > 0 && balances[_to] + _amount > balances[_to] (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/SocialFunToken.sol#71-73)
	- balances[msg.sender] -= _amount (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/SocialFunToken.sol#74)
	- balances[_to] += _amount (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/SocialFunToken.sol#75)
